mapper.insert: insert into MOXIE_INFO( ID, TASK_ID, USER_ID, APPLSEQ, IDNO, FLAG, REMARK, CREATE_DATE )values( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applseq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from MOXIE_INFO where APPLSEQ = #{applseq, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FLAG = #{flag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
